sentences.en: Allow yourself to be a conduit of nonverbal information.
sentences.cn: 让自己成为非口语讯息的输送管道.

sentences.en: Apply a non-hardening sealant to the threads of the terminal box connection port flexible metal conduit and seal fitting for waterproofing.
sentences.cn: 在接线盒连接口、挠性金属导管及密封件螺纹处涂上非硬化密封剂，用于防水。

sentences.en: Conclusion: The new antirefluxing conduit can prevent ascending cholangitis after the biliaryenterostomy.
sentences.cn: 结论: 自行研制的抗返流装置能预防姑息性胆肠内引流术后返流性胆管炎.

sentences.en: Disclosed are a system and method for growing photosynthetic cells in conduit.
sentences.cn: 本发明公开了用于在管道中培养光合细胞的系统和方法.

sentences.en: Features: 300 ℃ following in the work environment as a conduit.
sentences.cn: 特点: 能在300℃以下的工作环境做导线.

sentences.en: Il m'a indiqu é la route qui conduit à la gare.
sentences.cn: 他给我指出了去火车站的路.

sentences.en: Introduce the tube into that conduit, please.
sentences.cn: 请把电线插入那个导管内。

sentences.en: It is desirable that compensating cables be run in earthed conduit.
sentences.cn: 补偿导线最好在地下管道中穿过.

sentences.en: Management of water conservancy project is conduit branch a basic working function.
sentences.cn: 水利工程管理是水管部门一项基本的工作职能.

sentences.en: On global building sewer uses cupreous conduit is development trend.
sentences.cn: 在全球建筑上下水道用铜水管是发展趋势.

sentences.en: Pakistan became a conduit for drugs produced in Afghanistan.
sentences.cn: 巴基斯坦成了阿富汗毒品的贩运通道。

sentences.en: PVC conduit can be bent cold using the appropriate bending spring.
sentences.cn: 聚氯乙烯管道可以弯曲冷使用适当的弯曲春天.

sentences.en: Right Ventricle – to – Pulmonary Artery Conduit Longevity: Is it Related to Allograft Size?
sentences.cn: 右心室至肺动脉导管的寿命: 是否与移植物的大小有关?

sentences.en: Secure the payload and base ends of the conduit using fittings removed previously.
sentences.cn: 使用先前卸下来的配件将导管的有效负载端和底端固定住。

sentences.en: The figure is a circuitous conduit for the transmission of energies.
sentences.cn: 这图形是一种作为能量传导的迂回的媒介.

sentences.en: The standard technique is to invoke nationalism as a conduit for dissatisfaction.
sentences.cn: 惯用手法是通过煽动民族主义情绪来疏导不满情绪.

sentences.en: The water runs through by means of this conduit.
sentences.cn: 水通过这个管道流过去.

sentences.en: Wiring is enclosed in approved conduit ( if required by local codes ).
sentences.cn: 电线包裹在经过认可的导管内 ( 如果当地有关规定要求的话 ).

phrases.tran_cn: 导管系统；暗线装置系统

trans.tran_en: a pipe or passage through which water, gas, a set of electric wires etc passes
